05/01, I finally got my motorbike, I gave her a name- Rapid, because she moves so fast!
1月5日，我的机车终于到了，我准备给她取名为霹雳，因为她的速度肯定就像闪电一样快！
1月5日 ついにバイクが届いた！さっそく名前をつけたの。その名もイナズマ！絶対イナズマみたいに速いはずだからっ！
1월 5일 드디어 오토바이가 도착했어! 바로 이름을 지어줬지. 그 이름은 번개! 분명 번개처럼 빠를 거야!
<color=#ffd7b3>01/05: My motorcycle is finally here! I am going to name her Inazuma, because she will be as fast as lightning!</color>
01/05: Minha motocicleta está finalmente aqui! Nomearei ela de Raio, porque ela será tão rápida quanto um relâmpago!
My locomotive finally arrived on January 5, and I'm going to name her Thunderbolt, because she must be as fast as lightning!
Jan. 5: Finally, my bike arrived! I gave it a name right away. I named it Inazuma! I'm sure it will be as fast as Inazuma!
msg
06/01, I joined the motorbike club in school, an elder sister said I got talent on this and she likes me… I feel so good because no one laughed at me for my face.
1月6日，我加入了我学校中的机车部，没想到千羽学园居然真的有这种社团！第一次跟着学姐们去兜风，开机车真是太棒了！学姐说我是她遇到过的最有天赋的人，她说她很喜欢我……这是第一个没有因为我的相貌而看不起我的人……
1月6日 千羽学園のバイク部に入部した。バイク部があるなんて驚き！今日、先輩たちとツーリングに行ったけど最高だった！先輩は才能があるって言ってくれたし、不細工な私のことを可愛いと言ってくれた……。
1월 6日 센바 학원의 오토바이 부에 입부했어. 오토바이 부가 있다니 놀라워! 오늘 선배들과 투어링을 갔는데 최고였어! 선배가 재능이 있다고 해줬고, 못생긴 나를 귀엽다고 해줬어…….

<color=#ffd7b3>01/06: I joined the motorcycle club at school! I didn't think Senba Academy would have such a club! My senpai told me I am the most talented person she's ever met, and she said she likes me a lot... She's the first person who didn't judge me because of my looks...</color>

01/06: Eu me juntei ao clube de moto da escola! Eu não pensava que a Academia Senba teria tal clube! A Senpai me disse que sou a pessoa mais talentosa, que ela já conheceu, e ela disse que gosta muito de mim... Ela foi a primeira pessoa que não me julgou pela minha aparência.

On January 6, I joined the biker club at my school. I never thought there would be such a club at Chihaya! The first time I went for a ride with the girls, it was great to drive a motorcycle! Sister said I was the most talented person she had ever met, and she said she liked me a lot ...... This is the first person who didn't look down on me because of my looks ......

January 6, I joined the bike club at Senba Academy. I was surprised that there is a motorcycle club! I went touring with the seniors today and it was great! The seniors told me I was talented and that I was ugly and that I was pretty. ......
msg
13/01, we took challenges from Race club, it's fight between sports car and motorbike. They laughed for my face but I let them shut up with my speed.
1月13日，我们社团接受了飙速部的挑战，这是机车与跑车的战斗。我们相约在废墟后面的无人山道上比赛，据说这里已经有五年没有人来了，曾经这里还有“车神”的传说。她们嘲讽我的面容，但是我的速度让她们闭上了嘴巴。
1月13日 レーシング部と勝負することになった。コースは人気のない裏山。神速のカズハとかいう凄腕のドライバーが出る都市伝説もあるみたい。連中は私の外見を笑ったけど、誰も私の速度にはついてこれなかった。
1월 13일 레이싱 부와 승부를 겨루기로 했어. 코스는 사람이 없는 뒷산. 신속의 카즈하라는 엄청난 실력의 드라이버가 나온다는 도시 전설도 있는 모양이야. 걔들은 내 외모를 비웃었지만, 아무도 내 속도를 따라오지 못했어.

<color=#ffd7b3>01/13: Our motorcycle club has accepted a challenge from the racing club. A battle between motorcycles and sports cars. We met on the deserted mountain backroads behind the ruins. It's said that nobody has come here for five years, and that there used to be some urban legend of someone called "Kazuha of Godly Speed". They laughed at my looks, but my speed shut them up.</color>

01/13: Nosso clube de moto aceitou um desafio do clube de corrida. Uma batalha entre motocicletas e carros esportivos.   Nós nos encontramos na estrada vazia da montanha atrás das ruínas. Diz-se que ninguém veio aqui por cinco anos e que costumava haver alguma lenda urbana sobre o Deus das Corridas. Eles riram da minha aparência, mas minha velocidade calou eles.

On January 13, our club took on the challenge of the Speed Division, a battle between locomotives and sports cars. We met on the uncrowded mountain road behind the ruins, where no one had come for five years and where the legend of the "God of Cars" once existed. They mocked my face, but my speed made them shut up.

January 13th, I was to compete with the Racing Club. The course is an unpopular backwoods mountain. There seems to be an urban legend that there will be a great driver called "Kazuha of God's Speed" or something like that. They laughed at my appearance, but no one could keep up with my speed.
msg
02/02, we won a lot of matches, sister said I'm born for race matches. I'm so happy about it.
2月2日，我们的机车部又赢下了很多比赛，学姐说我仿佛就是为了机车而生的人一样。真高兴。
2月2日 今日もバイク部はレースに勝った。先輩は私のことを「まるでバイクのために生まれてきたような人だ」と言った……心の底から嬉しかった。
2월 2일 오늘도 바이크부는 레이스에서 이겼다. 선배는 나를 「마치 바이크를 위해 태어난 사람 같다」라고 말했어…… 정말로 기뻤어.
<color=#ffd7b3>02/02: Our club has won a lot of matches. Senpai said that I was born for biking. I'm so happy.</color>
02/02: Nosso clube ganhou muitas partidas. Senpai me disse que nasci para dirigir motos. Estou tão feliz.
On February 2, our biker section won many more races, and my sister said that it was as if I was born for bikers. I am so happy.
February 2, the bike club won the race again today. A senior said of me, "You are like a person who was born for motorcycles."...... I was happy from the bottom of my heart.
msg
13/03, we have another match tomorrow, elder sister made a promise with me, if I win tomorrow, she will consider to study for the local university.
3月13日，明天又有一场比赛，这是我跟学姐约好了的，如果我赢了，她就考虑攻读本地的学校，不过长空市的学校很难进，但是学姐说如果我赢了的话，她就会为我而努力的。
3月13日 明日もレースがある——先輩との大事なレース。先輩は難関校ばかりの長空市を出て、別の街の学校へ進学するらしい。けど、もし私がレースに勝てたら、ここに残って受験を頑張ると約束してくれた。
3월 13일 내일도 레이스가 있어——선배와의 중요한 레이스. 선배는 명문校만 있는 장공시를 떠나 다른 도시의 학교로 진학할 거래. 하지만 내가 레이스에서 이기면 여기에 남아 수험 공부를 열심히 하겠다고 약속해줬어.

<color=#ffd7b3>03/13: Tomorrow is another race — an important one with Senpai. She's leaving Nagazora City because there are too many prestigious schools, and going to a school in another town. However, she promised me that if I win the race, she'll stay here and do her best and study for the entrance exams.</color>

03/13: Amanhã, haverá outra partida. Eu fiz um trato com a Senpai. Se eu ganhar, ela vai considerar estudar para frequentar uma escola local. É realmente difícil de entrar em uma escola em Nagazora. Mas se eu vencer, ela vai tentar muito por mim.

There is another game tomorrow, March 13. This is a date with my sister, if I win, she will consider to study in a local school, but it is hard to get into a school in Changkong City, but my sister said if I win, she will work for me.

March 13, I have another race tomorrow--an important race with my senior. I heard that my senior is leaving Nagora City, which is full of difficult schools, to go to a school in another city. But if I win the race, he promised to stay here and do his best to take the entrance exam.

崩壊に浸蝕される最後の最後まで、先輩への想いを胸に頑張ったんだ……だから、力を振り絞って「助けて」ってメモを残したのね……。
붕괴에 침식당하는 마지막 순간까지, 선배에 대한 마음을 가슴에 품고 버텼어…… 그래서, 힘을 다해 「도와줘」라는 메모를 남긴 거구나…….

She persevered with her feelings for her senpai in her heart until the very end, when the Honkai was beginning to take hold... That's why she mustered up all her strength and left that "Help me" note...
No fim, quando ela estava sendo partida em pedaços e corrompida pelo Honkai, ela aguentou por causa da ligação dela com sua Senpai? É por isso que havia aquela nota com `Me ajude’...

She was about to be eroded by the end of the collapse of the erosion of the time, but also has been based on their own persistence for the school sister and persisted? That's why there is that "help me" ......
Until the very end, when the collapse was eroding him, he did his best with his feelings for his seniors. ...... So, with all his strength, he left a note saying, "Help me." ......

어떤 아이였는지는 모르지만, 외모와는 달리 그녀의 마음이 순수하고 아름다웠다는 건 분명해.
I don't know what kind of girl she was, but there's no doubt that her heart was pure and beautiful, no matter what she looked like.
Eu não sei como essa garota se parece, mas eu acho ela linda. Diferente de muitas pessoas.
